content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need HVAC assistance. May I start by getting your name, please?
Hi Jake! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Thanks, Jake. I’ve confirmed that we do service your area. What type of HVAC issue are you experiencing?
The air conditioner isn’t cooling properly, and it sounds like the fan is struggling.
I understand how frustrating that must be. When would be a good time for one of our technicians to come out and take a look?
Actually, I think I’ll try to fix it myself first before scheduling someone. Thanks though.
reason: Customer decided to try fixing the issue themselves
